text: Faking It is an American romantic comedy television series. MTV showed three seasons from 2014 to 2016. Faking It is set in Austin, Texas. It is about two high school girls who are best friends. They pretend to be a lesbian couple. == Other websites == * Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:2010s American television series Category:American LGBT television programs Category:American sitcoms Category:American teen television series Category:Television series set in Texas Category:English-language television programs
title: Faking It (2014 TV series)
